Text: Honestly, I WAS a college radio and club DJ in the early '80s, and this is, by far, the best '80s collection I have found.  It has Our Daughter's Wedding, The Monroes, Wall of Voodoo, EBNOZN, and a host of other iconic one hit wonders that rode college radio to some semblance of fame and fortune in those early days of "modern music".  Reminds me of long cold walks at 5AM from my dorm to the station building.  Get this...
